text: Rhuan Rogerio Elias Barbosa (born December 18, 1991 in Guaranésia), simply known as Rhuan, is a Brazilian footballer who plays as defender for Santo André. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Conmebol !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |valign="center"|Coritiba |2014 |Série A |colspan="2"|—||5||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||5||0 |- |valign="center"|Maringá |2015 |Paranaense |colspan="2"|—||10||1||3||1||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||13||2 |- |valign="center"|Londrina |2015 |Série C |12||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||12||0 |- |valign="center"|Vila Nova |2016 |Série B |colspan="2"|—||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||1||0 |- |valign="center"|Camboriú |2016 |Catarinense |colspan="2"|—||6||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||6||0 |- |valign="center"|Maringá |2016 |Série D |4||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||4||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !16!!0!!22!!1!!3!!1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!41!!2 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Londrina Esporte Clube players
